## SolidLineTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[SolidLineStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[SolidLineTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SolidLineTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<SolidLineTechniqueParams> 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechnique.name.md) | "solid-line" \| "dashed-line" |  |
